description: Lexi's shoot was a fantastic adventure in mixed messages. Some might call it topping from the bottom, others might call it being bratty, I'll let you decide and call it what you will.Lexi asked for a hard flogging and I made sure to dish it out along with some facial humiliation to cut her down a notch, but she was on the verge of crying from misery and pain the whole time. (She claimed afterward she was "tearing" and wasn't even near her limits...I call BS..but I cant be 100% sure.) Of course I don't mind ramping it up because no one is going to die from a hard flogging, but it kept my crew on edge for 5 hours straight, causing us to stop and start in order to check in with her and wipe away the tears. To add insult to injury, she mocked me in the closing interview saying I'd been to easy on her. Arrgh! If she has the nerve for a rematch, it's going to be a steel cage bout between us with no holds barred and we shall see if her ass can cash the checks her mouth wrote.
title: Brat! Arrgh!
